Aria Waitangi Day Sports Shears: Miri Haig wins woolhandling open final https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/aria-waitangi-day-sports-shears-miri-haig-wins-woolhandling-open-final/A63NCMKFWVDJ7JXL4ZX2YX34EQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/aria-waitangi-day-sports-shears-miri-haig-wins-woolhandling-open-final/A63NCMKFWVDJ7JXL4ZX2YX34EQ/ Doug Laing“I thought I’d just blow a few cobwebs out. I’m not sure how I pulled that one off." Wed, 07 Feb 2024 21:23:32 +0000 Miri Haig (right) after her Aria Waitangi Day Sports open woolhandling win, in her first final in 26 years. Chelsea Collier (left) came third and Hanatia Tipene was runner-up.
